tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I really Appreciate the services they provide.... We don't feel we are in clinic they're very friendly and treatment was so good I got relieve in a day... Anyone can visit and get treatment done without any fear.... I have visited many Dentist around Bangalore. But at Endomax you can feel that you are at right place and get best council and treatment...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Qurrath Sharief is a highly approachable doctor who gives attention to detail and made me smile perfectly again after my root canal and cap fitting. She along with her team of Mr. Mani who did suction and Dr. Veena who prepared me and helped me fix the appointment with periodical reminder and follow up post treatment. Dr Qurrath is an experienced doctor you can undoubtedly get your dental treatments done at Endomax dental clinic

Thank you Dr.Qurrath Sharief!I had a wonderful experience.She is a very friendly,humble and kind hearted human being.I had severe tooth pain and I am a diabetic Dr. Qurrath took the X-ray and explained everything very clearly.Dr.Qurrath took good care of me and saw that I was comfortable every minute. I thanked God that I was in the right hands.She started with my treatment and I dont know how it got over.I would highly recommend everyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I told my gums bleeding problems to the Dr. Qurrath Sharief. And she treated me very well.And she explained to me very good.Their personnel also interact good with people.

tags: Value for money,
review: The communication needs to be transparent and clear. When I first visited the Doctor I was told that wisdom teeth needs to be removed  so that the pain will reduce. Next session when I visited I was told that main purpose of the pain was not wisdom teeth but a RCT is required. This was very disappointing as this was told to me suddenly.During my third visit I was told it would cost 11000 for capping. When I visited fourth time it was told to me that I need to pay Rs 1200 more. I hope correct diagnosis is done so that the patient can take informed decision whether to proceed or not with the treatment.

review: Good work done by doctors.All doctors were friendly and  done the work patiently and accurately . Though the work is done to my satisfaction, but it is costly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The doctor put me at ease. She was very gentle and the treatment was pain free. I was very comfortable. She took the trouble to explain to me exactly what the problem was and how she was treating it. I was very relaxed throughout the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr. Qurrath Sharief at "Endomax Dental & Implant Center" for my wife's dental treatment. She diagnosed the problem very well and explained every point in a great detail with patience. RCT and teeth fillings were required which doctor did very well. The whole treatment had to happen in multiple sittings. Very happy with the treatment and follow up procedure of the hospital. We highly recommend the doctor and the hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,
review: for the first time a doctor cared to explain everything in detail. The fact that even in the middle of the treatment the doctor explained what was happening is an added plus point. Great place, pandemic protocols followed to the tee. since the good and bad are through the mouth, this is the dental clinic you must visit

She is friendly and gives all the information before starting the procedure,had a good treatment, I got my root canal done here and it was painless ,I would recommend this clinic since the clinic is well maintained very hygienic and friendly staff too.
